about_the_game:
Play the role of young Ember, as she confronts her fears in this dream forest;  curiously resourceful by day and mystically fierce by night.

Key Features:

  • Explore a dream forest as young Ember by day, collecting, building and preparing for the dangers of darkness.
  • Battle relentless monsters throughout the night as the mystical Werefox, empowered with fiery abilities, cosmic moon powers, and significant upgrades!
  • When not making progress in the dream world, awaken to Ember's bedroom, where new techniques can be purchased and dream-altering outfits can be unlocked.
  • Visit Ember's bad memories periodically in this 4 Chapter narrative, where a cast of magical friends will help Ember deal with her fears and become brave enough to drive the nightmares from her thoughts and dreams forever!

    Utilize the Forest



    The woods in Ember's dreams are how she imagines them: full of resources she can use to prepare for nightfall. Find materials to build and stock light sources, pick, pull and catch different ingredients for invaluable meals, and empower Ember's nightly werefox form! Ember's menu-free crafting experience enables you to quickly stack components together as you dash around the woods, using the fleeting daylight hours to quickly explore, scavenge and craft.

    Battle the Tides Of Terror



    As darkness envelops the woods, Ember will take on her combat-proficient form, enchanted with fiery abilities and magical powers. As she eats meals, various skills will stack to give her a strategic fighting chance against the ever-increasing bombardment of spooky enemies. Take back the forest from the shroud of fear to slowly (but permanently) populate the forest with new food sources, enabling Ember to become yet even stronger!

    Safe and Sound



    As Ember is defeated in her dreams, she awakens to her cozy bedroom. Her talking plush fox waits for her here to absorb the nasty "dreamite" Ember collects while asleep. This is turned "courage", the resource used to purchase new abilities and permanent upgrades!

    Ember can also catch up on her dream journal illustrations, which correspond to new discoveries and progress. These illustrations will give her additional courage to grow from, and a sense of understanding her progress across all of the dreams.

    By accomplishing specific achievements in her dreams, Ember will also unlock dozens of new outfits, which will enchant her and the dream forest in many different ways!

    Growing and Evolving



    While the plush upgrades, outfits, and story-based tasks completed in dreams are permanent, there are several ways each dream will give Ember a fresh start:
    • Experiment with a different combination of werefox abilities through feasting in the branching and expanding skill tree.
    • Consume rare "moon fruit" to try your luck with a new stack of cosmic moon powers.
    • Visit a new, procedurally-evolving woodland, ripe for Ember to explore, prepare and prove her tactics in.

    By improving and adapting to each dream and it's secrets, you can help Ember uncover and defeat the 4 nightmares of this dream world!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Integrated or Better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Gather and craft by day as young and resourceful Ember, and battle hordes of spooky enemies by night as a fiery Werefox. Conquer your fears by vanquishing their nightmare forms in this action roguelite experience with quick, menu-free crafting and dozens of powerful upgrades.
